_sText:
Ba_Assalto by -:[Dio]:- Bub√π

This is my first map,so be good.
I hope u will enjoy the gameplay.
If u like the map say thanks,
if u don't like the map say why.


Description:

Terrorist:
The Terrorists must attack the CT's fortress.
With a good team-work they can hide them self behind the walls and then go to assault the enemy stronghold,but don't forget to beware of snipers.
As an alternative there is a secret tunnel...

CounterTerrorist:
The CT enjoy the privilege of the bulletproof wall of the blockhouse.
There are a multitude of sniper spots to stop the terrorist's attack.
